E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/29/1988
Subject: Chris James failed learning new position
Chris James doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Ron Tingley healing process
Ron Tingley is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Progress of Chris Hammond
Dear Sir,
Chris Hammond has an ERA of 3.70 at A Burlington Braves!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/7/1988
Subject: Progress of Randy St. Claire
Dear Sir,
Randy St. Claire is doing pretty good at AA Greenville Braves!
He has an ERA of 2.08, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/12/1988
Subject: Mike Norris healing process
Mike Norris is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 6/16/1988
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Rich Puig



Date: Monday, 6/16/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Nick Esasky



Date: Tuesday, 6/24/1988
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Tom Filer



Date: Monday, 6/30/1988
Subject: I am a starter...
... so would you please put me in the rotation?
I want to go out there and start for my
team. Please come on, manager!

Regards,
Mike Krukow



Date: Sunday, 7/6/1988
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Dave Parker



Date: Monday, 7/28/1988
Subject: Progress of Lee Stevens
Dear Sir,
Lee Stevens has an AVG of .275 at AA Greenville Braves!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
